results.name: a(n) = (2 + (-1)^n) * (-1)^floor(n/2).
comment: The fractions A112031(n)/A112032(n) give the partial sums of a(n)/floor((n+4)/2).
Sum of the two Cartesian coordinates from the image of the point (2,1) after n 90-degree counterclockwise rotations about the origin. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 06 2013
